name: Monywa Day Trip from Mandalay including Lunch
description: Monywa, the capital city of Sagaing state and situated on the east bank of Chindwin River, is 87 miles away from Mandalay, and will take approximately 3 hours to drive. Learn and explore the famous Buddhist city of Myanmar with your professional English-speaking guide on this 8-hour trip. Lunch and hotel transfer is included.
